REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f0583 reute r f BC-NZI-CORP-UNIT-SELLS-G 03-12 0099

TEXT.TITLE: NZI CORP UNIT SELLS GUARANTEED NOTES AT 8.36 PCT
TEXT.BODY: NZI Capital Corp, a unit of <NZI Corp>, is offering 150 mln dlrs of guaranteed notes due 1997 yielding 8.36 pct, said sole manager Kidder, Peabody and Co Inc. The notes have an 8-1/4 pct coupon and were priced at 99.261 to yield 115 basis points more than comparable Treasury securities. Non-callable for seven years, the issue is rated A-2 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and A-plus by Standard and Poor's Corp. The notes will be listed on the New York Stock Exchange. NZI is an insurance company in New Zealand. Reuter
